command.name: localinfo
command.description: Shows or sets localinfo variables. Useful for mod programmers who need to allow the admin to change settings. This is an alternative storage space to the serverinfo space for mod variables. The variables stored in this space are not broadcast on the network. This space also has a 32-kilobyte limit which is much greater then the 512-byte limit on the serverinfo space. Special Keys: (current map) (next map) - Using this combination will allow the creation of a custom map cycle without editing code. Examples: localinfo dm2 dm4 localinfo dm4 dm6 localinfo dm6 dm2
